name: The Looped Heart Ring in White with Black Thread Detail
description:
A sophisticated 'Shabby Chic' inspired heart shaped ring.
Dimensions: 4.5x5.5cm (highest and widest point).

The handmade,  heart shape design of the ring is knitted from a 4 ply wool. The decorative thread on the 'Looped Heart' design is 100% cotton. The heart is then filled with stuffing.

The silver coloured ring finding has an antique silver finish (having an extremely low nickel content). The ring finding is an adjustable ring. Thus can be adjusted to fit any sized finger.
The heart shape design is then affixed to the ring finding firmly with the 4ply wool. 

All Jewellery is handcrafted to a high specification, therefore each piece cannot be guaranteed to be exactly the same as to that pictured.

name: The Triple Flowered Ring in White, Blue and Khaki Green
description:
A funky 3 flowered white, blue and khaki green chunky ring.

The handmade,  flowered design of the ring is knitted from a 4 ply wool. 

The silver coloured ring finding has an antique silver finish (having an extremely low nickel content). The ring finding is an adjustable ring. Thus can be adjusted to fit any sized finger.
The flowered design is then affixed to the ring finding firmly with the 4ply wool. 

All Jewellery is handcrafted to a high specification, therefore each piece cannot be guaranteed to be exactly the same as to that pictured.

name: Metallic Hearted Mobile Phone Charm in Pink
description:
A completely fab sparkly heart shaped mobile phone charm.
The heart has been knitted using a pink metallic yarn.

Dimensions (of the heart):
Height: 4cm
Width:  4.5cm
Depth:  0.5cm

The handmade, heart shape design of the charm is knitted from a sparkly metallic yarn. This yarn is 80% polyester and 20% nylon.
The heart is then attached to the black cord via the chrome fastenings.

All Jewellery/Acessories are handcrafted to a high specification, therefore each piece cannot be guaranteed to be exactly the same as to that pictured.

name: The Black Shabby Ring
description:
A seriously glamorous heart shaped ring in a shiny black eyelash yarn.
 
Dimensions: 
Height: 5cm
Width:  5.5cm
Depth:  2cm
 
Size: Universal

The handmade, heart shape design of the ring is knitted from a very funky eyelash yarn. It is shiny black in colour. This yarn is 100% polyester.

The silver coloured ring finding has an antique silver finish (having an extremely low nickel content). The ring finding is an adjustable ring. Thus can be adjusted to fit any sized finger.
The ring finding has been glued and sewn securely to the pattern of the heart design.
 
All Jewellery/Accessories are handcrafted to a high specification, therefore each piece cannot be guaranteed to be exactly the same as to that pictured.

name: The Metallic Diamond Ring in Gold
description:
A fab sparkly diamond shaped ring.
This ring had been knitted using a gold metallic yarn.

Dimensions:
Height: 6cm
Width:   5cm
Depth:   0.5cm
 
Size: Universal

The handmade, diamond shape design of the ring is knitted from a sparkly metallic yarn. This yarn is 80% polyester and 20% nylon.

The silver coloured ring finding has an antique silver finish (having an extremely low nickel content). The ring finding is an adjustable ring. Thus can be adjusted to fit any sized finger.
The ring finding has been glued and sewn securely to the pattern of the diamond design.
 
All Jewellery/Accessories are handcrafted to a high specification, therefore each piece cannot be guaranteed to be exactly the same as to that pictured.
